summary: This adds Paul Bunyan to your Skyrim. He Can be found on the second floor of The Bannered Mare in Whiterun. He is invulnerable...well cause he's Paul Bunyan Why not. You can give him armor and weapons just like other followers.
descriptionHtml:
This adds Paul Bunyan to your Skyrim. He Can be found on the second floor of The Bannered Mare in Whiterun. He is invulnerable...well cause he's Paul Bunyan Why not. You can give him armor and weapons just like other followers.



[size=5]Bugs (will tried to be fixed)
[/size]He will run away from combat
author: Xemnesxii
